thread.title: Heads Up: Jon Gray Makes a Super Bowl Cameo

author: Peter Grant
title: Heads Up: Jon Gray Makes a Super Bowl Cameo
text:
Sharp-eyed commercial-property investors watching the Philadelphia Eagles beat the New England Patriots in Super Bowl LII on Sunday might have noticed an unlikely TV cameo from one of the biggest names in their industry: Jonathan Gray, the head of real estate for Blackstone Group LP.
Mr. Gray was shown scrolling on his phone during a fan shot centering on Phil Basser, also known as “Philadelphia Phil.”
